question: Which union ministry has launched Green Good Deeds campaign?
option1: Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation
option2: Ministry of Women and Child Development
option3: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option4: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
explanation: Dr Harsh Vardhan, the Union Minister for Environment, Forest and Climate Change, has launched people-oriented campaign \"Green Good Deeds\" to sensitize the people and students, in particular, about climate change and global warming. Referring to the crucial role played by “Polio Sainiks” for Pulse Polio campaign, Dr Vardhan has underlined the need for “Green Sainiks” to broad-base the Green Good Deeds movement and to take it down to the grassroots level successfully. The Environment ministry has also appealed to the teaching community to join the campaign to make people aware about the cause of the campaign.
